column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:

the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:

who can break the spell of romance?

who can break the spell of romance?

column3: 这是太医院为小主所制的纤润膏
column6:
My Lady, this ointment was specifically
made for you by the Imperial Infirmary.
You have been losing weight, My Lady,
and this will help keep your skin firm.
Apply more on my waist.
I'm finished, My Lady.
Coua, help me…
My Lady, are you all right?
My Lady, My Lady!

Concubine An fainted
in the Palace of Prolonging Happiness.
Has an imperial doctor examined her yet?

column3: 去瞧过了可是走到门口
column6:
An imperial doctor went to her palace,
but Concubine An did not admit him.

column3: 安嫔却硬是不让进去瞧
听去请太医的小宫女说
column6: Concubine An's servant told the imperial doctor

column3: 安嫔是节食过度晕倒的
column6:
that Concubine An fainted due to her
excessively restricted diet.
Why is she on a diet?

column3: 听说那安嫔自失宠以来

column6:
I heard that ever since Concubine An fell out of favor,
she has been secretly practicing ice dancing.

An Lingrong's idea to regain favor by becoming
 an ice dancer shows thoughtfulness.

Every emperor of the Great Qing has shown
great appreciation for that art.

column3: 年年都要举办冰嬉演出
column6: There is a performance on the ice every winter.

column3: 钦定冰嬉摔跤满语骑射
column6: Ice dancing is also among the four national customs of the Great Qing,

along with the Manchu language,
wrestling, and horseback archery.

column3: 听说先帝的御前侍卫中
就有通过苦练冰嬉而平步青云的
column6:
One of the prior emperor's personal guards
gained high status by ice dancing.

column3: 娘娘此番预备如何应对
column6: How does Your Highness plan to counter this?

column3: 根本就不用应对她这是自寻死路
column6:
We need not do anything at all.
She is "seeking the path to her own doom."
The path to her own doom?
I'm too dull-witted to understand, Your Highness.

column3: 那冰嬉若无童子功的功底
column6:
One can only succeed in ice dancing
if they are trained since childhood.

column3: 则要求舞者身段轻盈柔若无骨
column6:
It requires a slender figure, and flexibility -
as if the dancer had no bones.

column3: 这更非是一朝一夕可以练成的
column6: It cannot be mastered overnight.
Although An Lingrong is delicate,

She is no longer slender
after so many years of luxury in the palace.

column3: 难怪要出节食这一招了
column6: No wonder she restricted her diet.
It is as Your Highness says.

column3: 节食既损容貌又不能立刻见效
column6: Dieting will affect her looks, but it takes a long time.

column3: 想来她现在也是心急如焚吧
column6: She must be burning with anxiety.

column3: 其实倒也有立竿见影的法子
column6: But there is a way she could get instant results.

If someone were to tell her,
I'm sure she would feel as if she found treasure.

column3: 那可万万不能让她知晓此法
column6: Then we must not let her find out about this method.
On the contrary, we must let her find out.

column3: 昔年赵飞燕得宠于汉成帝
column6:
Zhao Feiyan was the "flying swallow"
favored by Emperor Cheng of Han.

She was so delicate that
she could dance on a man's palm.

column3: 便是服用了药物息肌丸的功效
column6: It was because she used the Flesh Thinning Pill.
Place the pill in your belly button,
and it melts into your body.

column3: 可使肌肤胜雪身量轻盈
column6:
It will make your skin as fair as snow
and your body as light as a swallow.
Your face will shine with radiance.

column3: 只不过有一味麝香在里头
column6: But the pill contains musk as an ingredient.

column3: 麝香一味可是大损女子躯体的
column6: Musk damages women's bodies.
It not only causes infertility but also

column3: 也会使腹中胎儿早早地夭折
column6: will cause miscarriage in a pregnant woman.

column3: 那安嫔是最懂香料之人
column6: Concubine An is most knowledgeable about spices.
I fear the musk can't be concealed from her.

column3: 我知道瞒不过她 我也不想瞒她
column6:
I know that we cannot conceal it,
and I don't want to hide it from her.
It's her choice whether or not to use the Flesh Thinning Pill.
I've heard that bathing with golden azalea petals
can counteract the yin toxins of musk.

column3: 不知道安嫔会不会也知道此法
column6: Perhaps Concubine An also knows of this method.
If that really worked,

column3: 昔年飞燕合德掌握天下大权
column6:
then how is it that Feiyan and her sister Hede
possessed supreme power but bore no children?
They were able to bathe with all the golden azalea under Heaven.

column3: 叫她知道也好 只当羊花有效
column6: It's just as well she knows of this.

column3: 用起来更兵聿无忌惮了
column6:
If she thinks golden azalea will help,
 she will use the pills even more recklessly.

column3: 息肌丸拿去给安嫔了吗
column6: Did you give the Flesh Thinning Pills to Concubine An?

column3: 安嫔看见 二话不说就用了
column6: Yes. She took them without a word.
She is quite obedient.

column3: 她自己就已经悄悄向太医院求了
column6:
She had already asked the Imperial Infirmary for the pills
before Your Majesty granted them to her.

column3: 看来她倒真的不想要孩子
column6: It seems she really has given up on having children.

column3: 那不正好嘛 省得咱们费手脚了
column6: Isn't that wonderful? It saves us much effort.

column3: 是 没孩子的人本宫用着安心
column6: That's right. A childless concubine makes a harmless pawn.
The pill is incredibly effective.

column3: 小主这些日子确实纤瘦了不少
column6: My Lady has indeed become much slimmer these days.

column3: 只是这药太厉害了 奴婢担心
column6: But the medicine is too powerful, and I'm worried that...
There's nothing to be worried about.
Tomorrow is New Year's Eve.

column3: 我知道它里头的麝香含量有多少
column6: I know how much musk it contains.
I've drawn a bath with golden azalea petals for Your Highness.
I've already taken enough tonics of every kind these past years.
The bath won't make any difference.

column3: 小主一直没能怀上皇上的孩子
column6: My Lady, you haven't been able to bear a child for His Majesty.
You should think of a solution.
I'm controlled by others.

column3: 连怀孩子都不能自己拿主意
column6: I can't even be the one to decide on my own pregnancy.
Do you know how much I hate all of this?
But Coua, I have no other options.
I have to obey the Empress.
Last year's ice dancing was even better.

column3: 那出哪吒闹海极得本宫欢心
column6:
Especially the rendition of
"Nezha Conquers the Dragon's Sea".
The founding emperor Nurhaci was a great ice skater.

column3: 他带人出战走冰比马队还快
column6:
His troops on ice could move even faster
than the cavalries on horses.

column3: 听说皇上当年还是四王爷的时候
column6: I heard that when Your Majesty was still Lord IV,

column3: 年年冰上比骑射都能拿到好彩头
column6:
you won grand awards in the contest of
horseback archery on the ice every year.

column3: 逆风如解意容易莫摧残
column6:
"If the north wind can hear the plum flowers,
spare the blooming wishes for a peaceful spring."

column3: 当日朕与你也是结缘与梅花
column6: Our story began with plum flowers.
Your Majesty still remembers.

column3: 香中别有韵 清极不知寒
column6:
"Her pleasant scent accompanied by poetic charm;
she is so freshly elegant that she cannot feel the winter cold."

column3: 逆风如解意 容易莫摧残
column6:
"If the north wind can hear the plum flowers,
spare the blooming wishes for a peaceful spring."

column3: 皇上可还记得姐姐刚入府时
column6:
Does Your Majesty remember that my sister
liked to recite this poem when you and she were first married?

column3: 想不到纯元皇后也和臣妾一样
column6:
I'm honored to know that Empress Première
also appreciated the purity of plum flowers.

column3: 纯元与你同是性情纯净之人
column6: You and Première are both of a pure nature.
Concubine An.
Grace to Your Majesty.
Has your voice still not recovered?

My voice was damaged by something I ate.
I'm afraid it will never fully recover.

column3: 身子还没好就穿得这样单薄
column6:
You are not wearing enough clothes while still recovering,
and your hands are cold.
Su Peisheng, hand me my marten coat.

column3: 天寒地冻 不要冻坏了身子
column6: Don't get sick in this freezing weather.
It's a pity that your voice is damaged.

column3: 失之东隅 收之桑榆
column6:
"You lose something at sunrise,
you gain something at sunset."
Although Concubine An's voice is damaged,
her dance on the ice just now could surpass Feiyan.
I think Concubine An deserves to be called "Feiyan on the ice".

column3: 臣妾想起当年熹贵妃跳的惊鸿舞
column6:
It reminds me of Lumière's Dance of the Startled Swan.
She also looked like an immortal from Heaven.

column3: 当日熹贵妃作惊鸿一舞
column6:
Noble Consort Lumière's performance was stunning,
and yours was swift and elegant.

column3: 爱妃亦是翩然生姿 各有千秋
column6: You both have your merits.
I'm blessed to have you both.

column3: 臣妾怎敢与熹贵妃娘娘并肩
column6: How dare I compare to Her Noble Highness?
I am just "the ugly Dong Shi imitating the beautiful Xi Shi".

column3: 朕忘了问了你怎么会到这儿来
column6: I have not yet asked, why did you dare perform today?
I yearned for Your Majesty so much.

column3: 想着能远远看一眼皇上
column6:
I just wanted to be able to look at Your Majesty;
even a glimpse from afar would have satisfied me.
I have not Heaven's blessings to be able to serve Your Majesty.

column3: 今日能为皇上一舞已是三生有幸
column6: To dance for you today has been "an honor in three lives".
Since it was inappropriate for me to come out,
now that my dance is over,
I will accept any punishment that Your Majesty bestows.
All right, all right.

column3: 好了好了 留在朕身边过年吧
column6: Stay with me for the New Year.

column3: 熹贵妃已经安然生下皇子
column6: Consort Lumière has safely given birth to the heirs.

column3: 只是容儿惠嫔生产之前
column6: But Lingrong, before Concubine Vertu gives birth,
don’t go to the Palace of Pearl Jade.
I'm honored to obey Your Majesty.

column3: 只是臣妾与惠嫔姐姐情同姐妹
column6: Since Concubine Vertu and I are close like sisters,
I can't help but feel guilty
that I am unable to take care of her personally.
What a minx!

May my Emperor live and reign for ten thousand years,
and ten thousand of ten thousand years.

column3: 江南可采莲 莲叶何田田
column6:
"Lotuses are harvested south of River Yangtze.
How endless their verdant canopy expands!"

column3: 这些日子皇上一直宠着安嫔
column6: His Majesty has been favoring Concubine An recently.

column3: 再这样下去封妃也是指日可待
column6: If this continues, it is only a matter of time before she becomes a Consort.
She hasn't had it easy.

column3: 容貌呢 不是一等一的出挑
column6: Her appearance is not the best of the best.

column3: 还是那样的家庭又没有子嗣
column6:
Let alone her family background
and the fact that she has no children.
But she's been able to make it to today's status.

column3: 她不就是一味地装可怜吗
column6: All she does is act pitiful to gain sympathy.

column3: 偏偏皇上又是这样喜欢得不得了
column6: I can't believe His Majesty would fall for her tricks.

column3: 不只是皇上换做天下男人
column6: It is not just His Majesty.
Not a man under Heaven could refuse a woman like her.
My Lady, you've kept that bracelet in storage.
Why did you take it out today?

column3: 这东西还是原来皇上赏的
column6: This was bestowed by His Majesty.

column3: 如今这样的好东西已经少见了
column6: Such treasures are rare nowadays.

column3: 等一下你亲自拿去延禧宫
column6:
I want you to take it to the
Palace of Prolonging Happiness and present it to her.

column3: 如今上贡的翡翠一年不如一年了
column6: The tributary jadeite is getting worse year by year.

column3: 小主却让奴婢拿去送给她
column6: And yet you are giving such nice jewelry to her.

column3: 奴婢只可惜了这么好的翡翠
column6: I can only pity such excellent jade.
What pity are you speaking of?
Tell me, too.
Peace and grace to Your Majesty.
What lax servants outside!

column3: 皇上来了也不通传一声
column6: They didn’t announce the arrival of Your Majesty.

column3: 朕怕你在午睡就没吵你
column6: I was afraid you were napping, so I didn't want to wake you up.

column3: 没想到你们主仆正在说悄悄话儿
column6: I didn’t realize you were having a private chat.
Rise.

column3: 臣妾正在让浣碧找东西呢
column6: I asked Jade to look for something.
Please take a look, Your Majesty. What do you think?

column3: 这仿佛是朕上回赏你的东西
column6: This seems to be what I rewarded you last time.
You cherish it so much that you can't even bear to wear it.

column3: 好好的寻它出来做什么
column6: Why did you take it out?
I don't have the heart to wear it,

column3: 才要拿出来去送给安妹妹
column6: but I want to give it to Lingrong.

column3: 这样好的翡翠若不配美人
column6: Even Jade said, "If such good jewelry isn’t worn by a beauty,"
"what a pity it is for the jadeite."
The Empress has also showered her with rewards.

column3: 光内务府封的东西也够丰厚的了
column6:
The items provided by the
Household Department have been ample.

column3: 安妹妹的东西丰厚是一回事
column6: It’s nice that she has already received generous rewards.

column3: 臣妾的心意又是另外一回事
column6: but my sincerity is a different matter.

column3: 只是要拿着皇上赏的东西
column6: But in order to “present the Buddha with borrowed flowers”.

column3: 还得要问问皇上依不依呢
column6: I still need to ask for Your Majesty’s permission.
I see you have been wearing a new coral bracelet.

column3: 多了个珊瑚手钏 倒是挺好看的
column6: It looks pretty.

column3: 珊瑚原不是什么名贵的东西
column6: Coral is not a precious material.
I know that An likes jadeite,
which is why I want to give her this bracelet.
But Your Majesty is eyeing my other things for Lingrong.

column3: 容儿出身不高胆子又小
column6: Lingrong is not from a glorious family and is timid by nature.

column3: 宫里不喜欢她的嫔妃多了去了
column6: There are a lot of concubines who dislike her.

column3: 唯独你这么多年与她情同姐妹
column6: Only you have been like a sister to her all these years.
What a rarity it is.

column3: 嬛嬛有件事朕有些为难
column6: Huan Huan, I am in a dilemma about something.

column3: 嬛嬛未必能为四郎解忧
column6: Huan Huan may not be able to resolve Si Lang's concerns.
But I'm happy to be your audience.
It's about your parents.

column3: 恐怕不能很快入宫来看你
column6:
I'm afraid that they may not be able to visit you
 in the palace any time soon.
Why?

column3: 瓜尔佳氏联络群臣反对
column6: The Gūwalgiya Clan joined forces with many officials to oppose it.
They criticized me for being unjust due to personal favor.
Your Majesty is not unaware

that the accusations against my family could be
suspected of being a fabrication.

column3: 而且皇上也要为弘瞻的将来考虑
column6: Moreover, Your Majesty also needs to consider Hongyan's future.

column3: 总不能让他的外祖父永远是罪臣
column6: He cannot be the grandson of a guilty official.

column3: 皇上能否考虑重查当年之事
column6: Can Your Majesty ...
consider reinvestigating my family's case?

column3: 祺贵人在宫里并无什么大错
column6: Noble Lady Délice has not committed any grave mistakes in the palace.

column3: 瓜尔佳氏一族也暂时无隙可查
column6:
Also, The Gūwalgiya Clan hasn't given us
 an angle to reopen the investigation.

Reinvestigating past cases without any reason
will only threaten the stability of the imperial court.
Your Majesty, I can wait.

Your Noble Highness.

column3: 天气还凉贝勒怎么穿得那么单薄
column6: It's still chilly. Why does Venerable Prince Shen wear so little?
You should put on some warm layers.
I thank Your Noble Highness for your concern.

column3: 刚才在寿康宫给太后请安的时候
column6:
Her Majesty also reminded me when I was
paying my respects at the Palace of Longevity.
I think being well-fed and well-clad weakens one's character.

column3: 故而选择了单薄些的衣服来穿
column6: Thus I have chosen to wear thin clothes.
Elder sister, I've been looking for you.

column3: 再不回去弘瞻可要哭了呢
column6: If you don't go back now, Hongyan will start crying.

column3: 这位小主未曾见过 不知是
column6: I don't think we've met, My Lady. I wonder...

column3: 难不成略平头整脸些的
column6: Must every decent-looking girl be married to His Majesty?

column3: 都要嫁给皇上吗 我偏不是
column6: I'm not a concubine.
Why are you mentioning the word marriage?

column3: 女孩子嘴里竟没半句遮掩
column6: A girl should know what she can speak of.

Venerable Prince Shen, please don't feel like an outsider.
This is my younger sister.
She has rarely come out.
It is no wonder Your Lordship does not recognize her.

column3: 小妹从小长在边远之地
column6: My sister grew up in a remote area.
She's uneducated about palace etiquette.
I hope she did not incur Your Lordship's ridicule.
Now, greet Venerable Prince Shen!

It's no surprise that Your Lordship
mistook me for a concubine.

column3: 想来这宫中略有姿色的
都是受皇上雨露恩惠的人
column6:
In this palace, everyone with a pretty face
receives His Majesty's favor.
That was probably the reason for Your Lordship's speculation.
Yurao, that's enough!
Miss, you are very proud and haughty.

column3: 连皇兄富贵也视作无物
column6:
You seem to view His Majesty's power and wealth as nothing.
Perhaps ...

column3: 看来唯有十七哥的盛名
column6:
only the prestige of my brother, Lord XVII,
could catch your eye.

column3: 怎么唯有皇室公卿的男子
column6:
Why?
Do worthy men exist only in the imperial family?

column3: 我宁愿嫁与匹夫草草一生
column6:
I'd rather live a coarse life with a commoner
than marry into any imperial palace or estate.

column3: 也断不入宫门王府半步
失礼 是我小看了姑娘
column6: It was my discourtesy. I underestimated you.

My sister always talks bluntly but she didn't mean any offense.
I hope Your Lordship won't mind her.
Let's go, sister.
What's with you today?

What's on your mind?
You can't suppress your smile.
I'm not smiling.

column3: 你有什么事还想骗我别藏了
column6: Don't lie to me. You can't hide anything.
Come on, tell your 17th brother.

column3: 看到一个姑娘脾气大得很
column6: I met a girl with such a strong personality.
Also, she thinks we are not good enough for her.
True. What's good about us?
All we have is birth into the imperial family.
But, people have been stripped of their noble titles,

column3: 被削了爵位的大有人在
column6: and brothers have died fighting each other for the throne.
That is nothing to be envious of.

column3: 十七哥别说这些丧气话
column6: Brother XVII, enough of these depressing words.
Let's race!
Let's go!

column3: 娘娘温太医来请平安脉了
column6: Your Highness, Dr. Wen is here for routine pulse-taking.
Send him in.
Peace to Your Highness.
Don't be bound by formalities.
How is Meizhuang's prenatal qi?

column3: 惠嫔不出半月就要临盆了
column6: Concubine Vertu is going to deliver in less than half a month.

column3: 数月来她静心养胎胎气甚稳
column6:
She's been cultivating a peaceful mind for the baby
these months and her prenatal qi is very stable.

column3: 虽然每每都听你说一样的话
column6: Although every time you tell me the same thing,

My wish ran athwart
and I ended up a fool of my destiny.
column6:
My wish ran against my will.
Behold the mockery of destiny and the game of fate.

column3: My love was the wind-swept flowers from a tree.
column6:
My unwavering love is gone
like flowers swept away in the wind.

column3:
A plum bloomed in winter hoping for a fruitful summer.
But the irresistible winds of destiny destroyed her wish.

You can hear the flapping of a phoenix
but you will never see it.
column6:
A phoenix about to take flight rustles its wings
but the arc of its flight is unseen.

column3: What you see is the falling leaves from the phoenix tree.
column6:
The phoenix tree sways in the wind,
shedding memories in the whispers of the falling leaves.
